content: this pattern is a variation of the 6-day kid blanket 6dkb it is comprised of the same six row of single_crochet double_crochet and double_crochet granny clusters but it does not chevron this drama-free 6dkb stripe version is called the tranquility stripe the texture is both easy to work up and visually appealing in dreamy retro rainbow colors the floating clouds border is a variation of #14 from edie eckman s book around the corner crochet borders https //amzn to/3gsqtdy affiliate details us terminology finished size 41 x 48 skill level easy materials yarn dk weight acrylic 323 yards of each of eight colors stylecraft special dk https //www tinyurl com/bettysssdk affiliate 323 yards each of color a fondant color b saffron color c toy color d spring green color e cloud blue color f aster color g wisteria color h white what s the difference between this pattern and the original 6dkb list item size - this pattern makes a toddler blanket as did the original yarn list item weight - the original blanket used chunky weight yarn this pattern uses dk list item edge and border - this pattern has instructions for an edge and a custom-designed-by-betty border the original only gave instructions for tassels list item stitches this pattern uses the same six row of stitches that the 6-day kid blanket uses but the original 6dkb is a chevron style and this version does not chevron
